definition.name: LLM Action
definition.description: GitHub Action to interact with OpenAI Compatible LLM services
definition.author: appleboy

inputs.name: base_url
inputs.description: Base URL for OpenAI Compatible API endpoint

inputs.name: system_prompt
inputs.description: System prompt to set the context. Supports plain text, file path, or URL (http://, https://). For files, use absolute/relative path or file:// prefix. Supports Go templates with environment variables (e.g., {{.GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}, {{.MODEL}}).

inputs.name: input_prompt
inputs.description: User input prompt for the LLM. Supports plain text, file path, or URL (http://, https://). For files, use absolute/relative path or file:// prefix. Supports Go templates with environment variables (e.g., {{.GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}, {{.MODEL}}).

inputs.name: tool_schema
inputs.description: JSON schema for structured output via function calling. Supports plain text, file path, or URL. Supports Go templates with environment variables (e.g., {{.GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}).

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: Enable debug mode to print all parameters

inputs.name: headers
inputs.description: Custom HTTP headers to include in API requests. Format: "Header1:Value1,Header2:Value2" or multiline with one header per line. Useful for log analysis or custom authentication.
